overview: July 31, 1715: A fleet of 11 Spanish galleons set sail for Spain from Havana Cuba, loaded with untold riches of silver, gold, and jewels. A few days into their voyage, the entire fleet sank of the coast of Florida due to a massive hurricane. 6 galleons have been found. The treasures from the remaining 5 have been lying scattered along the ocean floor until now..$4.5 million in Spanish gold coins.
title: The Lost Treasure Fleet of 1715
